title: OCE Server "connection Error"
body: League is not letting anyone log on (my friends and i) for an unknown reason. Riot please fix! It started with "disconnected from PvP network, attempting to reconnect," hurry riot, we need you! Now im getting a log on error saying; "Connection Error." anyone else getting this?{{item:3070}}

replies.body:
https://twitter.com/PoodleCorp/status/747216102216785920

Seems they've done the same thing to OCE. Not 100% sure but im starting to think it's PoodleCorp behind this.{{summoner:3}}
Says NA but wouldn't put it past them to try for all servers.

Looks a lot like it, hacking something that ruins peoples fun doesn't seem like a very appealing thing, and the comments of the twitter post are right, pointless prison time at the expense of other peoples enjoyment.
I was in champ select and the game just crashed, lost one of my promo games to diamond because of this......... now i cant connect. This is incredibly frustraiting!

Hi folks

Just to let you know - we're on the case and I'm keeping [this thread](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/x72ALJh3-league-not-letting-me-log-on) updated.

Cheers
Mindstar

Why Poodle corp and riot fix it now i wanna play some shaco Mid BTW NEW META SHACO MID LOL
{{summoner:3}}

Myself and a friend are having this issue, repairing lets you login but the client is buggy (Shop won't load, errors popping up constantly) So if you want to get in that bad, try repairing but it won't let you do much.
I've submitted a ticket to riot in order to help, will update when I get a reply

From the status site "Network Operations – a few seconds ago
We're aware of a problem that's causing players to get stuck in a login queue, and are working on a fix."
Seems it'll be fixed soon enough, GLHF everyone.
Same here i done a lot of things to fix it but still got the connection error thing!
Ikr I restated computer, even redownloaded League of Legends still says that :(
Same! So do many of my friends.
Thought it was just me, thank god it's on Riot's end. i was just about to reinstall.

That was my first thought too, always check the forums for help before doing something that might be a pain in the ass. It helps :)
But yes, rito needs to fix whatever issue is going on here, a lot of keen players aren't able to jump on. Some have time sensitive things to do
fixed yet? i still cant logg on

I have the same problem this morning..
i was thinking about repairing lol?
